info.title: Textocat Beta
info.description: Textocat API enables scalable state-of-the-art NLP/search in your favorite language.

get.description: Full-text search over all the user's documents. Entity search is featured.

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: See http://docs.textocat.com/search-query-syntax.pdf for the description of the search query syntax.
